cast.name: 格里夫·弗斯特 Griff Furst

introduction: Detroit (Paul Sidhu), a former professional drag racer and part time drug dealer, gets early parole after making a deal with two corrupt DEA agents, Vaughn (Bryan Van Holt) and Janssen (Isaiah Washington). All he has to do? Only take down a dangerous kingpin (Angus Macfadyen) while avoiding the goons of a white nationalist gang leader (Kevin Gage) who's out for his head and try to keep his ex-military son (Renton Pexa) from getting them both killed.
